text:
I really, really wanted to like this place - especially since I live and work in the area.  But after giving it three tries, I give up.

In every instance I ordered the Greek village salad with a chicken skewer.  And each time there was something off.  Either the chicken was half a portion or dry - or the salad was half rotten, or not even a village salad.

Don't get me started on the rudeness of the young woman at the cash.

For $12, could you please, please get a basic salad and grilled chicken done right?  And for the love of Pete, nix that brown gloopy salad dressing!
